alert.note: Alert for Clinton (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 06 at 9:43PM CDT until August 07 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLINTON AND NORTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 943 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Okawville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Nashville, Centralia, Okawville, Wamac, Irvington, Ashley, Beaucoup, Hoyleton, Covington, Richview, Addieville, New Minden, Huegely, and Frogtown. This includes Interstate 64 in Illinois between exits 41 and 61. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Illinois. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
